alert.note: Alert for McLennan (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 26 at 5:24PM CDT until April 26 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN MCLENNAN COUNTY... At 522 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 7 miles east of Valley Mills, or 10 miles northwest of Waco, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and baseball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Lake Waco around 530 PM CDT. Northcrest around 600 PM CDT. Waco, Bellmead and Lacy-Lakeview around 605 PM CDT. This storm will impact the northern suburbs of Waco. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.75 IN
info.instruction: Motorists should not take shelter under highway overpasses.
